jobDescription:
First Role:  Software Developer - AI

12+ month contract

Remote

Our client is looking for 1-2 developers who can help them push some of our AI initiatives forward. 
Required Skills

C# - .NET 8+
PostgreSQL with Entity Framework Core
Experience with GitHub
Experience with AWS (Lambda, Cognito, CloudWatch, Aurora, Bedrock, VPC)

Nice to have

Angular 18+
Python 3.12+

Second Role: .NET Developer

Duration: contract throughout 2025, with opportunity to extend

Summary: This role will support our Finance and HR groups. Please note that there is an on-call rotation in scope. We expect 5 weeks of being on call throughout the year.

Technical/Candidate Profile:

B.S. in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or Software Engineering is preferred, but we would love equivalent experience too.
Passion for software development with diverse experience including new development, support and maintenance.
Minimum of 3 years demonstrated experience with Microsoft stack working across tiers (Object-Oriented design, C#, MVC, ASP, .NET, Web API, T-SQL, RESTful services, OAuth 2.0, Azure and Power BI)
Strong back-end development skills with experience in C#
Strong experience working with SQL Server and other database technologies.
Experience with Power Automate, Python, Alteryx and/or Azure preferred. 
Ability to work collaboratively with internal clients, business analysts, project managers and other developers to elicit requirements and successfully implement software projects.
Creative problem solver who is automation focused – success in reducing recurring work and automation to train users for self-service.
Quality focused, motivated by small quick wins and process improvement.
Comfortable working in an Agile/Lean development environment, successfully collaborating within and across teams.
SharePoint development experience a plus.
Willingness to participate in on-call support.
Comfortable working in an Agile/Lean development environment, successfully collaborating within and across teams.
Data integration experience a plus.
 

Qualities Needed:

Develop and build new solutions using a variety of technologies (full .NET stack, JavaScript frameworks, SQL, & PowerShell)
Analyze, design, and refactor business applications to bring them up to current standards
Maintain integrity of high-level design and architecture by participating in pairing and design/code reviews
Identify and implement problem resolutions and perform system and risk analysis
Participate in application reviews to help drive accurate and complete support documentation
Focus on automated testing and continuous delivery
Work with team members and key stakeholders to develop high level project estimates and creation of test plans
Partner with project teams to translate business and functional requirements into technical design
Seek out and apply new technologies and skills in daily work through conferences, online training, reading, participation in organizations and user groups, etc.
Participate in lunch and learns and other open learning opportunities to help further your craft
 

Benefits to being placed at company:

Long-term contract with potential for extended renewals
Team focused environment.  We treat our consultants as part of the team.
Rich developer community with lunch & learns on best practices.  Focus on software craftsmanship.
A DevOps culture. We use automated deployment and are constantly looking to improve in the DevOps space. Our DBAs/App Admins are part of our collaboration.
Agile/lean practices with diversity of projects
 

Third role:  Sr Software Engineer Full Stack (React /.NET core)

Location:  3X week onsite

Duration is five months.  Potential to extend for additional projects & development needs


Duties and Responsibilities:

The Sr. Software Engineer- Full Stack (React / .NET core) will work as a member of an agile software development team that is responsible for building and maintaining custom web applications for company.  The Sr. Software Engineer will participate in agile ceremonies and help facilitate good practices throughout the SDLC.   

Hands on design and development of applications using technologies such as React, Node & TypeScript
Work as a member of an agile software development team
Enhance and support existing applications
Troubleshoot problems identified by users
Collaborate with lead developers and analysts to understand requirements and develop solutions
Advocate for adherence to standards on the development team  
Qualifications:

Education and Years of Experience:  

Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, or a related field.
5+ years of professional software development experience
Required and Desired Skills/Certifications: 

React.js
Node.js
Next.js
.Net
SQL
Azure/Cloud Experience
Git/other source control
Strong professional written and verbal communication skills.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Experience working with agile methodologies.  
Notes: 

Must be FULL STACK--React/.NET Core--needs to be a contributor from Day One. Will be a consultant team member and will join a team of 5-6 employee developers.

Using ADO for DevOps

Must be able to build APIs

Not required but they will be integrating with an Oracle ERP system--so any related experience is helpful but not required.
